statements: SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT last_name, first_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND smoker = TRUE
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'AB'
SELECT patient_id, phone_number, height, weight FROM Patients WHERE smoker = FALSE
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, address, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE smoker = TRUE;
SELECT first_name, last_name, height, weight FROM Patients WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE blood_type IN ('A+', 'B+') AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY name
SELECT id, name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM lifestyles WHERE stress_level > 5 ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age < 25
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT name, diet, exercise FROM patients JOIN lifestyles ON patients.id = lifestyles.patient_id WHERE stress_level > 5
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT name, age, stress_level FROM patients JOIN lifestyles ON patients.id = lifestyles.patient_id WHERE diet = 'Vegan' AND sleep_hours > 7
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, phone_number FROM patients WHERE DATE_PART('year', date_of_birth) < 1990;
SELECT * FROM demographics INNER JOIN lifestyles ON demographics.patient_id = lifestyles.patient_id WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT patient_id, smoking_status, exercise_frequency FROM lifestyles WHERE smoking_status = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT p.patient_id, d.street_address, d.city, d.state, d.zip_code, d.country FROM patients p JOIN demographics d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, l.smoking_status, l.exercise_frequency FROM patients p JOIN lifestyles l ON p.patient_id = l.patient_id WHERE l.exercise_frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN lifestyles l ON p.patient_id = l.patient_id WHERE p.gender = 'Female' AND l.dietary_preference = 'Vegan';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE medical_history.diagnosis='Hypertension' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, lifestyle_data.height, lifestyle_data.weight FROM patients JOIN lifestyle_data ON patients.patient_id = lifestyle_data.patient_id WHERE height > 160 AND weight < 70;
SELECT DISTINCT patients.patient_name, treatment_plans.plan_description FROM patients LEFT JOIN treatment_plans ON patients.patient_id = treatment_plans.patient_id ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM medical_history ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, activity_level, exercise_plan FROM lifestyle WHERE sleep_hours > 7;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, start_date, end_date FROM medications WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor, reason FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT patient_id, condition, diagnosis_date FROM medical_history WHERE condition = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lifestyle WHERE activity_level = 'High' AND sleep_hours > 8;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-02-01';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, doctor FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30';
